Description: /Event/Description/The boundary mark of each run as the run data was merged

/Event/Description/A grayscale photograph of a famous person was presented for a random duration between 800 and 1000ms. Participants were told to fixate centrally throughout the experiment. To ensure attention participants were asked to press one of two keys with either their left or right index finger to indicate how symmetric they regarded each image
